message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I will not be able to meet at $10,750. My maximum budget remains at $9,500.
